item.title: 8 Hulk Stories In The MCU That Went Nowhere
item.description: The most frustrating thing about Hulk being sidelined in the MCU is how amazing plots were established that were completely abandoned or forgotten.

item.title: The Lord Of The Rings' 10 Greatest Heroes From The Race Of Men
item.description: The Lord of the Rings was successfully adapted into a movie trilogy, but not all its heroes made it onto the screen. The movies have a unique top 10.

item.title: Michelle Williams Recounts Her Unusual Preparation With Ryan Gosling For 2010 Drama Movie: "I Don't Know If Anybody Could Work Like That Again"
item.description: Michelle Williams and Ryan Gosling made movie magic together in 2010, but their preparation process likely won't be replicated any time soon.
